description: Detects a specific PowerShell command line pattern used by the UNC2452 actors as mentioned in Microsoft and Symantec reports Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: UNC2452 PowerShell Pattern
query: ((process.command_line:*Invoke\-WMIMethod\ win32_process\ \-name\ create\ \-argumentlist* AND process.command_line:*rundll32\ c\:\\windows*) OR (process.command_line:*wmic\ \/node\:* AND process.command_line:*process\ call\ create\ \"rundll32\ c\:\\windows*))
